title: Easy fresh chorizo, red pepper and chilli pizza
ingredients: ['300g strong plain bread flour', '1 teaspoon dried active yeast', '1 teaspoon salt', '200ml warm water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '125ml passata', '1 clove of garlic, crushed', '1 handful chopped fresh basil', '125g fresh mozzarella, torn into pieces', '100g chorizo, cut into 5mm slices (or to taste)', '1 red pepper, sliced', '1 chilli, chopped']
